alert.note: Alert for Hall; Howard; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sherman and Howard Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 518 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Merna to near Ansley to near Rockville. Movement was east at 50 to 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Boelus around 525 PM CDT. Dannebrog and Litchfield around 530 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include St. Libory, Ashton, Rockville, Farwell, St. Paul, Loup City and Sherman Reservoir Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
